snippet: Never mind corruption, our clownish president and the general drift, in South Africa political habits die hard.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Bongani Madondo, senior editor at the South African edition of Rolling Stone, contends that election victory of African National Congress is a reminder that South Africans remain loyal to the party, despite its corruption.
lead_paragraph: Never mind corruption, our clownish president and the general drift, in South Africa political habits die hard.
